tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted doctor Aditi for my wife's Pregnancy in july 2017 in Aayush clinic.She is attached to Godrej memorial hospital .My wife's delivery was on 23rd march 2018.
Dr Aditi singhi is humble and extremely cooperative. *** ** **** ************* *******Her very friendly nature makes a patient easy to explain the problem.she attained our query 24/7.She makes you feel at ease and is approachable at any given time and this helps a lot as a patient to clear any doubts or worries inmediately.
Her aayush clinic is very well equipped
Some IMP Things which she does greatly and professionally
*Share information with the patients on the process and Gives them the confidence.
*Guides them throughout the pregnancy.
*Clears out the Myth which a lot of pregnant women have to listen in terms of what to eat, what not to eat, what to do, etc.
*Has a very friendly approach which makes the patients to share even the smallest thing. That makes them comfortable.
*She is a great listener.

i highly recommend Dr Aditi singhi to everybody and she would be an amazing doctor and friend at the same time.
She is truly brilliant and I am sure she will positively touch the lives of her patients.
Keep it up.
Thank you so much for everything
Ketan and Shubhangee Upadhyay.

She is a wonderful doctor and a great human being. I visited her for miscarriage and thereafter a successful pregnancy. She has been my doctor throughout my 4+ years of ttc and fertility journey and finally helped me deliver my beautiful baby boy. My delivery and post partum recovery was very very smooth inspite of csection due to baby being breech and several other complications. She is my most preferred gynaec in town! Thanks a lot to Maam!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aditi Singhi is very humble, friendly and cooperative. We consulted her for our first baby and received complete attention. Dr. Aditi singhi is very patient for our each and every query and provided detail guidance during all our appointments.With best advice from Dr. Aditi and God grace, we had a smooth journey of pregnancy and we are blessed with healthy baby despite the complications.She has suggested Fortis hospital for the delivery under her observation which was the best and gave us pleasant memories and the staff also was very cooperative.We highly recommend and appreciate her for her work with all the good wishes!! ThanksNeha and Nitish Bhatia

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for pregnancy. I was 85kg when I was pregnant. And in 8 months I came to know that my water level was hot dropped. It was 6.5. The hospital in which I was willing to deliver, told me that they have to to csection. I met Dr Singh she didn't gave up and gave me medication and my water level went to 7 and Because of her I delivered my child in normal delivery.

dr.aditi is very humble, caring doctor. I have never seen such a gr8 human being.usually dr.doesnt visit only for 1 pt. but she do visited in godrej hospital only for me. she is my gynaecologist from 2013. I visited her for delayed period she took detailed history advise blood test and after confirming I am not pregnant she advise me tablet after that my period came but there was heavy bleeding so I called her she answered my call and advise tablet to stop bleeding.now blood flow is reduced. thank u so much dr.for being patience with me & answered my call & resolved my problems. I will highly recommend dr.aditi to all. she is not only professional but very friendly as well. may god give u more & more success. keep doing good work  Regards jenifer

One of my most memorable interactions with Dr. Aditi Singhi. I was blessed with a baby girl through normal delivery under her supervision. She was able to relate to every aspect of my  9 month journey. I would strongly recommend her because of her expertise and sincerity in her field. I wish her the best of luck in her career.

I had a very good experience with Dr. Aditi. She's a confident medical practitioner and rightly so since she guides you very well through every stage of pregnancy. She *** ********* ********* ** ***************** *********** *** will listen to your symptoms patiently. She always gave me timely and correct advice, which made being pregnant that much easier for me. She also provided the much-needed post-pregnancy care and advice. She was just what I needed!
*** ** * **** ******* Takes time explaining the issue and treats the right way... I trust her treatment.
